<bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:9:2:53" default="NO">9, 2, 53</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">esse videatur, jam nimis frequens, octonarium incohat,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:9:4:73" default="NO"><author>id.</author> 9, 4, 73</bibl></cit>.— With a <hi rend="ital">subject-clause</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">erat adhuc frequens senatoribus, si quid, etc....loco sententiae promere, = usitatum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:2:33" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 2, 33</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">parere ergo exceptionem rei judicatae, frequens est,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2806,001:44:2:6" default="NO"><author>Dig.</author> 44, 2, 6</bibl></cit>.</sense><sense id="n18755.4" n="II" level="1"> <usg type="style">Transf.</usg>, of a multitude, <hi rend="ital">assembled in great numbers</hi>, <hi rend="ital">full</hi>, <hi rend="ital">crowded</hi>, <hi rend="ital">numerous</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">videt multos equites Romanos, frequentes praeterea cives atque socios,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,005:3:7" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Verr. 1, 3, 7</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">refert etiam, qui audiant, frequentes an pauci an singuli,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,037:3:55:211" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> de Or. 3, 55, 211</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">major frequentiorque legatio,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:5:5:10" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 5, 5, 10</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">senatus fuit frequentior quam, etc.... frequentes fuimus, omnino ad ducentos,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,058:2:1:1" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Q. Fr. 2, 1, 1</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">senatus frequens convenit,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,056:10:12:3" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Fam. 10, 12, 3</bibl></cit>; cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">senatus frequens vocatu Drusi in curiam venit,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,037:3:1:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> de Or. 3, 1, 2</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,012:2:6:111" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plaut.</author> Mil. 2, 6, 111</bibl>; cf. <cit><quote lang="la">also: frequentissimo senatu,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,035:2:38:99" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Phil. 2, 38, 99</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">ad frequentiores consultatio dilata,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:35:7:1" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 35, 7, 1</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">legem populi frequentis suffragiis abrogare,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,039:62:222" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Brut. 62, 222</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">mane Germani frequentes ad eum in castra venerunt,</quote> <trans><tr>in great numbers</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0448,001:4:13:4" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Caes.</author> B. G. 4, 13, 4</bibl></cit>; cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">eodem conveniunt undique frequentes,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 7, 63, 6</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0448,002:1:13:1" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> B. C. 1, 13, 1</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">frequenti consessu,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1348,001:life=aug.:44" default="NO"><author>Suet.</author> Aug. 44</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">convivio frequenti,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1348,001:life=jul.:31" default="NO"><author>id.</author> Caes. 31</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1348,001:life=tib.:61" default="NO"><author>id.</author> Tib. 61</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">frequenti auditorio,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1348,001:life=cl.:41" default="NO"><author>id.</author> Claud. 41</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">equites Romani, qui frequentissimi in gradibus Concordiae steterunt,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,035:7:8:21" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Phil. 7, 8, 21</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">huc postero die quam frequentissimi conveniunt,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0448,001:4:11:5" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Caes.</author> B. G. 4, 11, 5</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">frequens ibi hic piscis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:9:180" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 9, 59, 85, § 180</bibl></cit>: huc frequens Caementa demittit redemptor Cum famulis (<usg type="style">poet.</usg> for famulis frequentibus), <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,001:3:1:34" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Hor.</author> C. 3, 1, 34</bibl>.—</sense><sense id="n18755.5" n="B" level="2"> Of places filled with a multitude, <hi rend="ital">filled</hi>, <hi rend="ital">full</hi>, <hi rend="ital">crowded</hi>, <hi rend="ital">populous</hi>, <hi rend="ital">much frequented</hi>, <hi rend="ital">well stocked</hi> (syn.: plenus, abundans).— Constr. <hi rend="ital">absol.</hi>, with <case>abl.</case>, and in Tac. also <pb n="780" /> <cb n="FREQ" /> with <hi rend="ital">gen.</hi> </sense><sense id="n18755.6" n="(a)" level="5"> <usg type="style"><hi rend="ital">Absol.</hi></usg>: <cit><quote lang="la">frequentissimum theatrum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,053:1:28" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Div. 1, 28 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">sic ut nulla (praefectura) tota Italia frequentior dici possit,</quote> <trans><tr>more populous</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,028:8:21" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Planc. 8, 21</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">ei processit, ut est frequens municipium magna multitudo,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,035:2:41:106" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Phil. 2, 41, 106</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">Numidia,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0631,001:J. 78" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Sall.</author> J. 78 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">celebre et frequens emporium,</quote> <trans><tr>much frequented</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:38:18:11" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 38, 18, 11</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">via,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,004:1:585" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> A. A. 1, 585</bibl></cit>; cf. <cit><quote lang="la">compita,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,004:2:3:26" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Hor.</author> S. 2, 3, 26</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">ludi,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> Carm. Sec. 22</bibl></cit>; cf. <cit><quote lang="la">pompa,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,004:1:147" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> A. A. 1, 147</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n18755.7" n="(b)" level="5"> With <case>abl.</case> (since the Aug. per.): <cit><quote lang="la">cum situm moeniaque et frequentem tectis urbem vidissent,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:1:9:9" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 1, 9, 9</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">loca aedificiis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:31:23:5" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 31, 23, 5</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">Aegyptus multis (urbibus),</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:5:60" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 5, 9, 11, § 60</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">terra colubris,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:4:620" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 4, 620</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">Sinuessa niveis columbis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,010:15:715" default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 15, 715</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">silva trabibus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,010:8:328" default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 8, 328</bibl></cit>; cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">locus piceis ilicibusque,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,002:16:54" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> H. 16, 54</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">nemus agrestium pavonum multitudine frequens,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0860,001:9:2:13" default="NO"><author>Curt.</author> 9, 2, 13</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">Nilus feris et beluis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:5:53" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 5, 9, 10, § 53</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">amnis vorticibus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:9:106" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 9, 106</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">vivarium piscibus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0845,001:8:16:4" default="NO"><author>Col.</author> 8, 16, 4</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">pharetra telis Lernaeis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1014,001:Herc. Fur. 1233" default="NO"><author>Sen.</author> Herc. Fur. 1233</bibl></cit>.—<hi rend="ital">Comp.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">utra pars frequentior vicis esset,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:35:11:5" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 35, 11, 5</bibl></cit>.—* </sense><sense id="n18755.8" n="(g)" level="5"> With <hi rend="ital">gen.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">quod talis silvae frequens fecundusque erat (mons),</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:4:65" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 4, 65</bibl></cit>.—Hence, <pos>adv.</pos>: <orth extent="full" lang="la">frĕ-quenter</orth>. </sense><sense id="n18755.9" n="1" level="3"> (Acc. to I.) <hi rend="ital">Often</hi>, <hi rend="ital">frequently</hi> (not freq. till after the Aug. per.): <cit><quote lang="la">ut frequenter et assidue consequamur artis rationem studio et exercitatione,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Auct. Her.</author> 4, 56, 69</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">ad aliquem frequenter ventitare,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,043:1:9" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Rep. 1, 9</bibl></cit> (Moser, frequentes); cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">gratior (erat) Alexandro frequenter in officinam ventitanti,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:35:85" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 35, 10, 36, § 85</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">praecipue quidem apud Ciceronem, frequenter tamen apud Asinium,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:1:8:11" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 1, 8, 11</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">frequenter in his etiam conjecturae locus est, nonnumquam tractatur aliqua finitio: aliquando etiam legales possunt incidere tractatus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:3:8:4" default="NO"><author>id.</author> 3, 8, 4</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">habet usum talis allegoriae frequenter oratio, sed raro totius,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:8:6:47" default="NO"><author>id.</author> 8, 6, 47</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">continuo aut certe nimium frequenter,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:9:1:11" default="NO"><author>id.</author> 9, 1, 11</bibl></cit>; <cit><quote lang="la">opp. semper,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:12:1:3" default="NO"><author>id.</author> 12, 1, 3</bibl></cit>; <xr><lbl>v.</lbl> <ref type="sym" targOrder="U">infra</ref></xr>.—<hi rend="ital">Comp.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">quod et M. Cicero scripto ad Brutum libro frequentius testatur,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:1:10:4" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 1, 10, 4</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">haec ad conjecturam frequentius pertinent, sed interim ad jus quoque,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:5:10:38" default="NO"><author>id.</author> 5, 10, 38</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">ne plebs frumentationum causa frequentius a negotiis avocaretur,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1348,001:life=aug.:40" default="NO"><author>Suet.</author> Aug. 40</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">non alias missi cecidere frequentius ignes,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,007:3:287" default="NO"><author>Ov.</author> F. 3, 287</bibl></cit>.—<hi rend="ital">Sup.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">translatione frequentissime sermo omnis utitur,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,040:24:81" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Or. 24, 81</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">non semper, etiamsi frequentissime, tuenda veritas erit,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:2:17:36" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 2, 17, 36</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1348,001:life=aug.:43" default="NO"><author>Suet.</author> Aug. 43</bibl>.— </sense><sense id="n18755.10" n="2" level="3"> (Acc. to II.) <hi rend="ital">Numerously</hi>, <hi rend="ital">in great numbers</hi>, <hi rend="ital">by many</hi> (very rare): <cit><quote lang="la">huic frequenter interceditur,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,057:1:19:5" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Att. 1, 19, 5</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">Romam inde frequenter migratum est,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:1:11:4" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 1, 11, 4</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
